mapper.select: SELECT p.pbno, fp.phot FROM busk b, phot p,(SELECT * FROM feed_phot GROUP BY pbno ) as fp WHERE b.bno = p.bno AND p.pbno = fp.pbno AND b.bno=#{no} ORDER BY p.cdt DESC limit #{rowNo}, #{size}

select * from( select * from(SELECT p.pbno,fp.fpno,pc.pcno, fp.phot AS feedphotos,fb.phot AS feedprofphot,fb.name AS teamname, fb.genre,fb.city, p.cont AS feedcont, p.lcnt, cb.phot AS comtphot, cb.name AS comtname, pc.cdt, pc.cont FROM phot p, feed_phot fp, phot_comt pc,busk fb,memb m,busk cb WHERE p.pbno=fp.pbno AND p.pbno=pc.pbno AND p.bno=fb.bno AND pc.mno=m.mno AND m.mno=cb.bno AND p.pbno=#{no}) as t1 UNION ALL select * from (SELECT p.pbno,fp.fpno,pc.pcno,fp.phot AS feedphot,fb.phot AS feedprofphot,fb.name AS teamname, fb.genre,fb.city, p.cont AS feedcont,p.lcnt,m.phot AS comtphot,s.name AS comtname,pc.cdt,pc.cont FROM phot p, feed_phot fp, phot_comt pc,busk fb,memb m,sup s WHERE p.pbno=fp.pbno AND p.pbno=pc.pbno AND p.bno=fb.bno AND pc.mno=m.mno AND m.mno=s.sno AND p.pbno=#{no}) as t2 UNION ALL select * from (SELECT p.pbno,fp.fpno,pc.pcno,fp.phot AS feedphot,fb.phot AS feedprofphot,fb.name AS teamname, fb.genre,fb.city, p.cont AS feedcont,p.lcnt,m.phot AS comtphot,m.nik AS comtname,pc.cdt,pc.cont FROM phot p, feed_phot fp, phot_comt pc,busk fb,memb m WHERE p.pbno=fp.pbno AND p.pbno=pc.pbno AND p.bno=fb.bno AND pc.mno=m.mno AND m.flag=1 AND p.pbno=#{no}) as t3 ) as tab order by cdt desc
